dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_A
dialogue_turns.text: Okay, so listen to this, right? Senator Marat Kozhaev, he's saying, like, getting a driver's license in Kazakhstan? It's, uh, far too simple.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Okay, so listen to this, right? Senator Marat Kozhaev, he's saying, like, getting a driver's license in Kazakhstan? It's, uh, far too simple.
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: "Right now, getting a driver's license in Kazakhstan is far too simple," Kozhaev stated.

dialogue_turns.text: Far too simple! Yes, exactly! I saw that and I was like, wait, what?
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Far too simple! Yes, exactly! I saw that and I was like, wait, what?

dialogue_turns.text: He's literally saying it needs a policy review because it's just, uh, too easy, you know?

dialogue_turns.text: Right? And he used to investigate road accidents! Like, he knows what he's talking about, from, uh, actual experience.

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_B
dialogue_turns.text: Yeah, he's saying people don't, like, value them. They treat them as a mere formality.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Yeah, he's saying people don't, like, value them. They treat them as a mere formality.
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: ...value their licenses rather than treating them as a mere formality," the senator emphasized.

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_A
dialogue_turns.text: Which, if you think about it, is just... it's insane for something that's, uh, a potentially deadly weapon, really.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Which, if you think about it, is just... it's insane for something that's, uh, a potentially deadly weapon, really.

dialogue_turns.text: Exactly! A potentially dangerous vehicle, he called it. Yes!
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Exactly! A potentially dangerous vehicle, he called it. Yes!

dialogue_turns.text: And he's comparing it to other countries, saying, like, globally it's just so much harder to get one.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: And he's comparing it to other countries, saying, like, globally it's just so much harder to get one.

dialogue_turns.text: Yeah, and that leads to better training, right? And, um, supposedly fewer accidents.

dialogue_turns.text: Supposedly! No, I mean, that's what he's advocating for. He says, like, people develop necessary skills, you know?
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Supposedly! No, I mean, that's what he's advocating for. He says, like, people develop necessary skills, you know?

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_B
dialogue_turns.text: But then, wait, the same guy, right? This Senator Kozhaev? He was, uh, commenting on softening drunk driving punishments?

dialogue_turns.text: Oh, yeah, that's the kicker! Yes, exactly! The very same one.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Oh, yeah, that's the kicker! Yes, exactly! The very same one.

dialogue_turns.text: I mean, how does that even, like, compute? That juxtaposition is just...
